thread.title: The Political War on Sandwiches
thread.title_full: The Political War on Sandwiches - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: The Political War on Sandwiches
text:
By now you’d think progressives might be absorbing the reality that Democrats lost the presidential election in part thanks to a cultural intolerance that harassed anyone—from florists to CEOs—who disagrees with them. Not so much: Witness the response to those associating with Donald Trump. 

On Monday Casey Patten, co-founder of a Washington “handcrafted” hoagie shop called Taylor Gourmet, attended President Trump’s signing of an executive order directing federal agencies to repeal two regulations for every new one...
